title: Creamy Italian Chicken
directions: Directions: Place the chicken in a 3-quart slow cooker. Combine salad dressing mix and water; pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours.

In a small bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms. Pour over chicken. Cook 1 hour longer or until chicken is tender. Serve with pasta or rice. Garnish with oregano if desired.
ingredients: 1 can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
